de.arm.bot.info

Class InitInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.arm.bot.info.InitInfo

  • public class InitInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class that holds all information given on the start of the game. These information will be used to generate the maze, the player and to initialize the KI.
    Author:
    Team ARM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int mazeHeight
      The height of the maze
      private int mazeLength
      The length of the maze

      The level of the maze Should be between 1 and 5

      The given id of the player

      The starting X-coordinate of the player
      private int playerY
      The starting Y-coordinate of the player
      private int sheetCount
      The starting sheet count of the player.

                int sheetCount)
        Constructor used by level 5 Initializes all fields
        Parameters:
        mazeLength - The length of the maze
        mazeHeight - The height of the maze
        mazeLevel - The level of the maze
        playerX - The starting X-coordinate of the player
        playerY - The starting Y-coordinate of the player
        playerId - The given id of the player
        sheetCount - The count of sheets the player holds at the beginning

    • Method Detail

      • generatePlayer

        private Player generatePlayer()
        Generates a new Player object based on the given player infos
        Returns:
        the generated Player

      • generateMaze

        private Maze generateMaze()
        Generates a new Maze object based on the given Maze infos and a generated Player
        Returns:
        The generated Maze

      • generateKI

        public KI generateKI()
        Generates a new KI based on the maze Level and the generated Maze and Player. Only supports level 1-5. For unsupported level a LevelOneKI will be generated For level two the LevelTwoExtraKI will be loaded for known mazes. This is accomplished by analyzing the infos given about the maze. If the maze is unknown, then a normal LevelTwoKI will be generated
        Returns:
        The generated KI

        public java.lang.String toString()
